data.name: Label154.Text
data.value: Reminder: It is not recommended to save your precious memories as .avif due to details smearing issues in AV1. For high-quality image storage, please consider .webp. Use video encoders libaom-av1, libsvtav1, or librav1e to output to .avif files. Presets and quality settings can be set normally. The latter two are recommended as their smearing is more acceptable than the former. libsvtav1 is hard to distinguish when crf=12. libsvtav1 requires massive memory. For extreme resolutions up to 16384x8704, resolutions exceeding 8K must use preset 5 or lower.

data.name: TextBox1.Text
data.value:
Wildcard strings are case-sensitive; please fill them in carefully. Path quotes will not be added automatically; please handle them yourself.
<InputFile> Represents the full path of the input file.
<InputFileWithOutExtension> Represents the input file path without its extension. Note that the dot is considered part of the extension.
<InputFilePath> Represents the path of the folder containing the input file.
<InputFileName> Represents the name of the input file without its path.
<InputFileNameWithOutExtension> Represents the name of the input file without its path and extension.
<\InputFileWithOutExtension> Escaped version of <InputFileWithOutExtension>, suitable for use in filters.
<\InputFilePath> Escaped version of <InputFilePath>, suitable for use in filters.
In fact, these strings will work anywhere else, but there's no need to do that.
